ing: 1 (8 ounce) jar mango chutney (such as Major GreyÂ®), chunks removed
1 cup shredded coconut, or to taste
1/2 cup chopped cashews, or to taste
4 green onions, chopped, or to taste
des: "When all of these flavors come together, your taste buds will get really excited and you'll be shoveling in some more! Serve with your favorite crackers."
ins: Mix cream cheese, sour cream, and curry powder together in a bowl; spread mixture onto the middle of a plate. Top cream cheese mixture with a layer of chutney, a layer of coconut, a layer of cashews, and a layer of green onions.
